text: Hu'neanagi ama ana antahi'zana ana mika'mo'za ontahi'naze. Na'ankure mago'amo'za, havi anumzankura tamage'zane hu'za nentahi'za, antahintahimo'a meninena me'negenokino, ne'zama kresramna hunte'naza ne'zana nenaze. Zamagra zamagesama antahi'zana tamage huta Anumzamofo mono hunentone nehu'za, ne'zana nenageno zamagu zmagesamo'a savri nehie.
